About UnfollowLens

UnfollowLens is a free web service that helps you easily find Instagram accounts that don't follow you back.

Features

ğŸ”’
100% Privacy

Data is deleted immediately after analysis and never stored on our servers.

âš¡
Fast Analysis

Get results within seconds after uploading your file.

ğŸ’°
Completely Free

No registration or payment required. Free for everyone.

ğŸŒ
Multi-language

Supports Korean, English, Japanese, Chinese, and Spanish.

How It Works

  1. Download Instagram Data: Download your data from Instagram in JSON format.
  2. Upload File: Upload the downloaded ZIP file to UnfollowLens.
  3. View Results: See the list of accounts that don't follow you back.

Why UnfollowLens?

  • Safe: No Instagram password required. Uses official data download feature.
  • Accurate: Automatically categorizes deleted/private accounts and shows only active ones.
  • Trustworthy: Open-source project with transparent operation.
â˜• Support This Service

If UnfollowLens was helpful, consider buying me a coffee!
